name: Fire Out
description:
This is our first game jam, and this is a little demo of our idea. You are a wicked fireman whose job is to keep the fire alive. Burn the place down!

Thanks for playing.

Controls

Move: W, A, S, D

Pull object: Shift (Hold only Shift key while very close to an object to pull it)

Use Extinguisher: Space

Start Fire: Ctrl

Credits

AlecAcosta: Programming

SoulAssassin: Furniture and objects sprites

DenyGamez: GUI sprites

Scorder: Fireman sprites

SFX from freesound.org and zapsplat.com
